title: MZBUTIQ Thin Nylon Watch Strap Band Replacement(10-24mm)
features: Each watch strap is made with quality nylon material, an eye for detail and a lot of creativity. With about 1.10mm thin nylon cloth, more breathable for your wrist skin. Tightly-woven nylon strands for added comfort, better flatness(unlike ordinary nylon band flex easily).

DESIGN: one-piece design adds security for your watch, when one pins of the watch breaks, the other pin will hold your watch. Soft and breathable, versatile and durable; widely used in outdoor activities, withstand water, sweat, heat, dirt/mud; and could clean easily and last.

CRAFT: all joints and holes are cutted by advanced laser technology for added comfortable against skin and firmness of the edges, and for less stretching of the holes. The 4 rings(include the pin buckle) are sewned with sturdy and reinforced stitching for its durability.

BUCKLE: buckle with one piece design, add extra security for your watch. Polished finish, bright and shiny. The double hardware loops can hold the excess portion of the strap. This nylon watch strap is lighter and breathable to wear than other type watch bands.

Feature: multiple color to choose, every watch strap will add a bit of color to your everyday outfit. Package include: 1*watch strap, 1*install tool, 2 spring bars. Tips: suitable for watch with straight lug end, not suitable for smart watch.
description: We focus on quality products, from the material selection to the humanised design of products. We focus on high quality service, from warm service before sale to patience after sale. Our goal: live a better life with our better products and better service. About product materials: high-quality thin nylon. The thickness of the nylon is approx. 1.1-1.2 mm to make the bracelet easy. About the buckle: 4-ring polished pin buckle The second short strap keeps the watch in place. If you like lightweight, you can cut it yourself and melt the edge. Size information: please measure the final width of watch lugs in millimetres, and confirm your wrist size before purchasing. Thin nylon strap width: 10 mm, 12 mm, 13 mm, 14 mm, 15 mm, 16 mm, 17 mm, 18 mm, 19 mm, 20 mm, 21 mm, 22 mm, 23 mm, 24 mm. Colour selection: a variety of colours to choose from. About suitable watches: suitable for watches with straight stud ends, not suitable for smart watches (heart rate blocking). Package includes: 1 x watch strap + 1 x tool + 2 x spring bars About After-Sales - If you have any problems with the bracelet, please do not hesitate to contact us by email (seller). We offer you a better solution.
